item.title: Hugo Command
item.description: start hugo server # hugo server -D new post # hugo new posts/hugo-command.md

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello, apa kabar? Note: my article was originally published on IstroSec blog In the second part of our overview we continue with the selection of the most used and most usable malware analysis tools. Moreover, we select the tools which are freely available. This time, we focus on tools for analysis other types of the files instead of the native binaries from the previous blog. Wireshark Wireshark is the well known tool for analysis of network traffic and network protocols.
